attributes.action: stop the planned 66% pay rise for MPs and limit the amount awarded to no more than the annual rate of inflation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To award themselves a massive 66% pay rise would show the total contempt MPs have for their constituents. They should set an example and accept a pay rise equal to the annual rate of inflation.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "stop the planned 66% pay rise for MPs and limit the amount awarded to no more than the annual rate of inflation."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page10778.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/MPspayrise/
